# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a unique chance to acquire something truly special at a competitive rate. We believe in the immense potential of this product to add value to your life or business, and we are confident it will exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
response: I'd like to reject Alice's offer. The price is too high for me. I'll look for a better deal. {"decision": "RejectOffer"}
